experiences: Maintaining and enhancing the IIC website using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Chakra UI, and Node.js, implementing new features and optimizing the user interface for an enhanced user experience.

Developing a mobile app using React Native and Tailwind CSS tailored for new Muslim converts.

Managed version control and deployment using Git/GitHub, and deployed the application on AWS for enhanced accessibility and scalability.
Created tests, projects, assignments and worksheets for kids ranging from age 10-12.
